text: Gerald "Jerry" Wilson (August 7, 1906 - June 10, 1945) was a sailor from Canada, who represented his country at the 1932 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles, US. ==References== * Category:Canadian male sailors (sport) Category:Sailors at the 1932 Summer Olympics – 6 Metre Category:Olympic sailors of Canada Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Canada Category:1906 births Category:1945 deaths
title: Jerry Wilson (sailor)
